controller

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.AbstractController
      • controller.GameController

  • public class GameController
extends AbstractController
    The Controller in charge of the actual game. Contains methods for updating the current GameState and starting/stopping the Timer for the game-loop.

        Parameters:
